properties.areaDesc: Butler, AL; Escambia, AL; Conecuh, AL; Covington, AL; Crenshaw, AL
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 13 at 9:35AM CST until January 13 at 11:30AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Southeastern Butler County in south central Alabama...
Western Crenshaw County in south central Alabama...
Eastern Escambia County in south central Alabama...
Southern Conecuh County in south central Alabama...
Northwestern Covington County in south central Alabama...

* Until 1130 AM CST.

* At 933 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding in
the advisory area. One to two inches of rain have already fallen
in portions of the advisory area.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Andalusia, Brewton, Evergreen, East Brewton, McKenzie, River Falls,
Castleberry, Red Level, Heath, Gantt, Riverview and I65 And US 84.

Additional rainfall of up to two inches is expected over the area.
This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small
creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as
well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.
